property.name: Move existing fighters to new carriers
notes
property.value:
=== NEUSCHWABENLAND ===
by Sieg
==Turn Order==
Russia,Japs,Brit,Germany
Russia and Brit against Germany and Japs
== Production ==
Each non original Factory can Produce 5 Units
Multiple Factories in a Territory are Possible
==New Units are available==
PU/Attack/Defend/Move/Special
Infantry 2/1/2/1
Elite 3/2/2/1
Early Fighter 8/3/2/4
Scout 4/2/1/2 (transport cost 1!)
Halftrack 5/2/2/3 (can Blitz)(Infantry support)
Big Armour 7/4/3/2
==National Advantages==
Russia: Katyusha 5/3/2/3 (Infantry support)
Japan: Shinano 18/1/3/2 (Carrys 3 Fighters)
U.K: Lancaster 18/5/2/6
Germany: Me 262 13/4/2/5 (Strat.Bombing)

Grey Terretories belong to Start Country

=== Let There Be War ===
-------- sieg -----------

Converted up to TripleA 1.2.x.x by Veqryn
